import React, { useState } from 'react' import './categoriesTab.scss' import MyTitle from '../../../MyTitle/MyTitle' import CategoriesConfig from '../CategoriesConfig/CategoriesConfig' const CategoriesTab = ({ category, idx, tab, setTab, listItems, setListItem }) => { const [modal, setModal] = useState(false) const removeCategory = category => { setTab(listItems[idx - 1] || listItems[1]) return setListItem(listItems.filter(e => e !== category)) } return (
{category}
Active tasks
Completed tasks
) } export default CategoriesTab
